title: 05/27/2021 - HOUR 1 - Fans, Tebow, Packers, Tua
itunes:title: 05/27/2021 - HOUR 1 - Fans, Tebow, Packers, Tua
description:
The Knicks-Hawks series is showing us why fans are important

What are the Jaguars doing?

Should the Packers have let Aaron Rodgers know they were drafting a QB?

Was there a purpose to Tua Tagovailoa's comments?


Guest: Peter Schrager

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
